abstract: Prosecutors wanted to keep Facebook from telling users about 15 subpoenas of their data. But a judge refused, saying the need for them was not specific enough.
snippet: Prosecutors wanted to keep Facebook from telling users about 15 subpoenas of their data. But a judge refused, saying the need for them was not specific enough.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Brooklyn ruled on Thursday that prosecutors could not force Facebook to remain silent about 15 grand-jury subpoenas involving the company’s customers.

headline.main: Brooklyn Judge Will Not Force Facebook’s Silence on Subpoenas
headline.print_headline: Judge Will Not Force Facebook’s Silence on Subpoenas

abstract: Microsoft’s update to Windows 10 has had complications for some people, but you can prepare for a few of the unexpected side effects.
snippet: Microsoft’s update to Windows 10 has had complications for some people, but you can prepare for a few of the unexpected side effects.
lead_paragraph: Q. I am considering the upgrade from Windows 7 to Windows 10, but I have heard you can lose your files in the process. Is this true?

headline.main: What to Do if Windows 10 Eats Your Files
